verbs.description: Healthcare stocks [V: are] climbing after President Donald Trump 's much anticipated speech on how to lower drug costs in the US .
[ARG1: Healthcare stocks] are [V: climbing] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump 's much anticipated speech on how to lower drug costs in the US] .
Healthcare stocks are climbing after [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] much anticipated speech on [ARGM-MNR: how] to [V: lower] [ARG1: drug costs] [ARGM-LOC: in the US] .
